---
id: client-initiate-recurring-payment-v-2
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Create Recurring Payment"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Recurring Payment creations, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, this just a suggestion."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Create Recurring Payment"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Create Recurring Payment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/recurring-payments/v2/initiate/{recurringConsentPactualId}/{recurringPaymentPactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Recurring Payment creations, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, this just a suggestion.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"recurringConsentPactualId","description":"The Recurring Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"recurringPaymentPactualId","description":"The Recurring Payment PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Recurring Payment request that will be sent by BaaS to the Client","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for RecurringPaymentRequest","description":"","required":["payment","consent"],"type":"object","properties":{"consent":{"description":"Object containing ProviderPaymentConsent Data information.","type":"object","properties":{"recurringConsentId":{"description":"Consent unique identifier for the Recurring Payment\n","type":"string","title":"RecurringConsentId"},"statusUpdateDateTime":{"format":"YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ","description":"Date and time the entity was updated\n","type":"string","title":"StatusUpdateDateTime"},"loggedUser":{"description":"User (natural person) that is logged in the PISP.","type":"object","properties":{"document":{"description":"Object containing document information","required":["identification","rel"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"The number of the document","type":"string","title":"Identification"},"rel":{"description":"The type of document (CPF/CNPJ)","type":"string","title":"Rel"}},"title":"Document"}},"title":"LoggedUser"},"businessEntity":{"description":"Legal entity to which the shared data refers. This field is required.","enum":["NAO_INFORMADO","FALHA_INFRAESTRUTURA","TEMPO_EXPIRADO_AUTORIZACAO","REJEITADO_USUARIO","CONTAS_ORIGEM_DESTINO_IGUAIS","CONTA_NAO_PERMITE_PAGAMENTO","SALDO_INSUFICIENTE","VALOR_ACIMA_LIMITE"],"type":"string","title":"RecurringConsentRejectReasonCode"},"detail":{"description":"Details about the rejection.","type":"string"}},"title":"RecurringConsentRejectReason"}},"title":"RecurringConsentRejection"},"revocation":{"description":"Consent revokation information.
